name: Inspire Me
author: P B Arun Sarathy

sections.description:
Inspire Me is a tiny plugin that sits on your shoulders like a butterfly to inspire you with bite-sized quotes.

This shows up near the right side top portion of your WordPress admin screens (all screens) – exactly next to your ‘Howdy, name’ area. This has more than 175 small 2 words to few words one-liners that motivate.

Here are some examples: * Beginnings Are Always Messy. * Never Doubt Your Instinct. * All You Have Is Today. * Build Your Discomfort Zone. * Sweat Is Just Fat Crying.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/inspire-me directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. There is no step 3. Sorry to disappoint you.
